snippet: About 20 percent of American adults lack credit scores, a fact that can bar them from getting an education, starting a business or buying a house.
lead_paragraph: About 20 percent of American adults lack credit scores, a fact that can bar them from getting an education, starting a business or buying a house.

headline.main: Millions Miss Out Because They Are ‘Credit Invisible’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
